summary: Successfully completed comprehensive security cleanup of UwU-CLI repository. Removed .autopilot.json and .env files from entire git history using git-filter-repo, scrubbed inline secrets, force-pushed cleaned history, and implemented comprehensive security measures including .gitignore, template files, and security documentation. All sensitive data has been completely purged from the repository.
current_status: Security cleanup complete. Repository history rewritten and cleaned. Sensitive files (.autopilot.json, .env) removed from all commits. Comprehensive security infrastructure implemented to prevent future exposure. Force-push completed successfully. Next steps: rotate exposed API keys, contact GitHub Support for cached diff cleanup, and notify collaborators to re-clone.
